name: A 15 Puzzle Game Watch & Phone
description:
Casual puzzle game inspired by the 15-Puzzle:

Goal of the over 100 years old 15-Puzzle is to slide tiles with numbers or images in the correct order.

Nearly everybody played this game as a kid. Now you can play it on your favourite iOS devices:

- Slide the numbers into the right order against the time.
- Slide picture snippets into the right order
- Select your own pictures from camera roll
- Choose between three difficulty modes with 16, 36 or 64 tiles
- The best score for each mode is stored
- Challenge you friend with the Game Center integration
- Share your results with your friend with the Mail, Twitter, Facebook or Game Center integration

Works on the Apple Watch, iPhone/iPod and iPad.
